mapper.select: SELECT item_no AS itemNo, name, price, image_no AS imageNo, production, weight, detail, final_price AS finalPrice, sales FROM product WHERE name = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( item_no, name, price, category_no, image_no, production, weight, expired, detail, discount, final_price, sales, reg_dt, mod_dt ) VALUES ( #{itemNo}, #{name}, #{price}, #{categoryNo}, #{imageNo}, #{production}, #{weight}, TO_DATE(#{expired}, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{detail}, #{discount}, #{finalPrice}, #{sales}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
